What type of file system is the hard drive?
Are you using a live cd??
Can you mount your hard drive with the live cd?
Mounting is basicly making the drive available for access
um....you would have to do that with a linux live cd unfortunately

boot into a live cd and go to the terminal. THe command "mount" should show you the location of your harddrive (most likely hda) then once you have that type mkdir /mnt/hda   then  mount -t ntfs /dev/hda1 /mnt/hda
if it gives you errors while trying to mount that is most likely your problem with the install cds
or qtparted on mandrivia i belileve
